welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cayey, Puerto Rico! Known for its charming mountain views and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in our vibrant city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Isla Grande Airport serves domestic flights within Puerto Rico.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Isla Grande Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mercedita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mercedita Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
